CEPT
====

Make sure you create a config file called CEPT.yml with the following content:

	appkey: <yourappkey>
	appid: <yourappid>

Examples of using the testscript.

=============

=============
	[CEPT.git $] perl CEPT_test.pl -m autocomplete --t1 appl --rows 10
